option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
verbose. Log information to the console.
filename of the fitacf format file. If this is omitted the file is read from standard input.
files are in the fit format.
filename of the fit format file.
filename of the index file to create.

synopsis.p: Creates an index of a fitacf format file.

description.p: Creates an index of a fitacf format file.
If the input file is a fitacf format file, then the index is written to standard output.

example.description: Create an index file for the fitacf format file "20040830.gbr.fitacf". The index is writen to the file "20040830.gbr.fitinx".
Create an index file for the fit format file "20040830.gbr.fit". The index is writen to the file "20040830.gbr.inx".
